content: Gnomes Wimmelbild is a type of puzzle or hidden object game that originated in Germany. "Wimmelbild" is a German word that means "teeming picture" or "busy image." In this type of game, the player is presented with a detailed and busy image, usually depicting a whimsical or fantasy scene, such as a garden or forest filled with various characters and objects. The objective is to find specific items or characters hidden within the image. Gnomes Wimmelbild specifically focuses on gnomes or other fantastical creatures as the main theme of the game.
